org.xeroserver.x0library.command

Class CommandBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xeroserver.x0library.command.CommandBuilder

  • public class CommandBuilder
extends Object

    A class to build command strings which can be used as input for the CommandParser.

      • CommandBuilder

        public CommandBuilder(String head,
                      String arg_prefix,
                      String flag_prefix)
        Parameters:
        head - Head of the command (e.g apt-get update)
        arg_prefix - Prefix of upcoming arguments (e.g - or /) Default: -
        flag_prefix - Prefix of upcoming flags (e.g -- or #) Default: --
